panels.description: Shows if metrics are being received for the selected time range.

targets.expr: vector(1) and on() ((count(up{job=~"integrations/windows.*"} == 1) > 0) and (absent(absent(windows_cs_hostname{job=~"integrations/windows.*"})))) or vector(0) and on() ((count(up{job=~"integrations/windows.*"}) > 0) and (absent(windows_cs_hostname{job=~"integrations/windows.*"})))

panels.title: Metrics

panels.description: Shows the timestamp of the latest metrics received for this integration in the last 24 hours.

targets.expr: vector(1) and on() ((count(up{job=~"integrations/windows.*"} == 1) > 0) and (absent(absent(windows_cs_hostname{job=~"integrations/windows.*"})))) or vector(0) and on() ((count(up{job=~"integrations/windows.*"}) > 0) and (absent(windows_cs_hostname{job=~"integrations/windows.*"})))

panels.title: Latest metrics received

panels.description: Shows the installed version of this integration.
panels.title: Integration version

panels.description:
The number of replication operations that are pending in Active Directory.
These operations could include a variety of tasks, such as updating directory objects, processing changes made on other domain controllers, or applying new schema updates.
panels.title: Replication pending operations

panels.description: The current number of active threads in the directory service.
panels.title: Directory service threads

panels.description: The number of synchronization requests that are pending in Active Directory. Synchronization in AD refers to the process of ensuring that changes (like updates to user accounts, group policies, etc.) are consistently applied across all domain controllers.
panels.title: Replication pending synchronizations

panels.description: The rate of LDAP read, search, and write operations.
panels.title: LDAP operations

panels.description: The rate at which LDAP bind requests are being made.
panels.title: LDAP bind requests

panels.description: Distribution of different types of operations performed on the Active Directory database.
panels.title: Bind operations overview

panels.description: Rate of replication traffic between servers within the same site.
panels.title: Intrasite replication traffic

panels.description: Rate of replication traffic between servers across different sites.
panels.title: Intersite replication traffic

panels.description: The rate of traffic received from other replication partners.
panels.title: Inbound replication updates

panels.description: Distribution of different types of operations performed on the Active Directory database.
panels.title: Database operations overview
